item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260126.3)
item.description:
What's New

fix: Improve backspace restore reliability and dictionary download

  • Add bufferDesyncDetected flag to track buffer-screen mismatch
  • Skip restore when desync detected (engine lacks full context)
  • Only verify AX when focus/cursor changed (avoid AX race condition)
  • Normal backspace now trusts history without AX verify
  • Dictionary download: use reloadIgnoringLocalCacheData for fresh data
  • Add unit tests for VNEngine backspace restore scenarios
